about_the_game:
Something is watching you. Something is waiting.

Alone in the dead of night, you find yourself sent on a simple errand—to check on a quiet gas station on the outskirts of town. But nothing here feels right.

The air is heavy with something unspoken, the radio crackles with words that don't belong, and the station itself... shifts.

Every step forward drags you deeper into a nightmare of fractured reality and unseen terrors. Strange voices whisper in your ear, shadows stretch and writhe, and the choices you make will carve your fate.

Will you listen? Will you obey? Or will you resist, knowing that every decision carries a price?

Features:

  • Psychological Horror – Experience a slow-burning descent into paranoia, dread, and disturbing imagery.

  • Decision-Based Gameplay – Every choice you make alters the experience, shaping the horrors that unfold.

  • Atmospheric Pixel Art – A haunting, detailed world brought to life with eerie animations and lighting.

  • Dynamic Sound Design – A chilling original soundtrack and unnerving ambient sounds that react to your actions.

  • Multiple Endings – Your fate is not set in stone. Discover different outcomes depending on your actions.

This isn't a place you can escape by running. Something wants you here. And it will make sure you stay.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains themes and depictions that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players will encounter:

-Psychological horror elements, including intense and unsettling scenarios.
-Depictions of violence and references to death, presented in a pixel art style.
-Disturbing dialogue and scenarios involving coercion, threats, and psychological manipulation.
-Themes of self-harm and sacrifice, presented as part of the narrative choices.
-Mild references to alcohol usage in dialogue or environmental storytelling.
-Please note that while these elements are integral to the storytelling and atmosphere, they are handled with care to serve the narrative and are not gratuitous. 

Players sensitive to these topics are advised to proceed with caution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: A unique psychological horror visual novel with an ever-shifting narrative that explores the deepest corners of the protagonist's mind. Meet characters whose dark secrets will leave you questioning reality, all set to a gripping retro soundtrack. The night listens, but are you listening?
